mapper.insert: insert into movie_table(movie_id,kor_title, eng_title, release_date, rating_star, audiences, running_time, production, genre, country, rating_age, img_url, synopsis) values(#{movie_id},#{kor_title},#{eng_title}, #{release_date}, #{rating_star}, #{audiences}, #{running_time}, #{production}, #{genre}, #{country}, #{rating_age}, #{img_url},#{synopsis})
mapper.select: select count(*) from movie_table where genre like CONCAT('%', #{genre},'%')
